entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
